step.tex: \int \sqrt{x} \left( 3 x^2 + 2 x + 3\right)dx \\ \qquad\qquad\quad = \int \left( 3 x^2 \sqrt{x} + 2 x\sqrt{x} + 3\sqrt{x}\right)dx \\ \qquad\qquad\quad = \int \left(3 x^{\dfrac{5}{2}}+2x^{\dfrac{3}{2}} + 3 x^{\dfrac{1}{2}} \right)dx\\ \qquad\qquad\quad = 3 \dfrac{x^{\dfrac{7}{2}}}{\left(\dfrac{7}{2}\right)}+ 2\dfrac{x^{\dfrac{5}{2}}}{\left(\dfrac{5}{2}\right)} + 3 \dfrac{x^{\dfrac{3}{2}}}{\left(\dfrac{3}{2}\right)} + C\\ \qquad\qquad\quad = \dfrac{6}{7} x^{\dfrac{7}{2}} + \dfrac{4}{5}x^{\dfrac{5}{2}} + 2 x^{\dfrac{3}{2}}+ C\\ \text{Here, C is the constant of integration}
